name: THE LOVE COLLECTION 2012 *Pre-order*
description:
The Love Collection 2012 is a double CD compilation of some of the best up and coming bands in the world right now, this is the second annual compilation.
All proceeds will be going to Oxfam and Amnesty, for more information on any reasoning/info please visit our Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/LAmourRecords

Included in this package; Double CD housed in a black plastic double CD case, along with a choice of 3 different covers, all featuring original photography // Handwritten Tracklisting // Handwritten Thank you note // Excerpt from 'The Dharma Bums' // Added extras like leaflets, letters, cards, zines, nice things. These will probably all be randomized and are secret until delivery :) 

I want this package to ultimately inspire and make people happy, raising money for charity is only one thing I want to do with this, I want to make the people who buy it happy too. Thank you.

ALSO, NONE of this money is going to me, the costs are all coming out of my own pocket as my own donation, the price dictates what % is going to charity, 100% of your money.



***PLEASE NOTE*** THIS IS A PRE-ORDER, BUT ALL ORDERS WILL BE SHIPPED BEFORE CHRISTMAS ***


Please note; FOR MAINLAND EUROPE ORDERS PLEASE CHOOSE 'GERMANY'. FOR USA AND CANADA PLEASE CHOOSE 'UNITED STATES'. FOR AUSTRALIA CHOOSE AUSTRALIA. ANYWHERE ELSE PLEASE EMAIL loverecords@live.co.uk

name: ALEXANDER KORDA - 'HIDDEN IN THE CREASES' *SOLD OUT*
description:
**OPEN PRE-ORDER OF THE SECOND PRESS**

'Hidden In The Creases' is Alexander Korda's first and last release from beyond the grave. Including the popular 2011 EP 'Vous Avez Encore Des Secrets Á Dire'' (with 2 bonus tracks) and a CD featuring 10 live/unreleased/demo tracks, this package has everything Alexander Korda ever created, and comes with a beautiful 24 page zine showing the complete (although short) history of the band and all it's original names/members/shows.

BLACK TAPES WITH BLACK CASES AND NEW ARTWORK, ENCASED IN A CARDBOARD MAILER.
CD IN A SLEEVE WITH A FOLDOVER COVER AND SEPERATE TRACKLISTING.
24 PAGE ZINE WRITTEN AND COMPOSED BY KEEGAN OF ALEXANDER KORDA.
LYRICS BOOKLET FROM FRANK OF ALEXANDER KORDA.

**PLEASE NOTE** THIS IS AN OPEN PRE-ORDER WE WILL BE ORDERING THEM IN 48 HOURS AND SENDING THEM OUT DURING NEXT WEEK (DEPENDING ON THE AMOUNT OF ORDERS WE GET)// FOR MAINLAND EUROPE ORDERS PLEASE CHOOSE 'GERMANY'. FOR USA AND CANADA PLEASE CHOOSE 'UNITED STATES'. FOR AUSTRALIA CHOOSE AUSTRALIA. ANYWHERE ELSE/ANY QUESTIONS THEN PLEASE EMAIL loverecords@live.co.uk

name: CITYCOP - 'SEASONS' CASSETTE PRE-ORDER (SECOND PRESS) **SOLD OUT**
description:
Limited to 10.
Second press.

Super limited UK release of the amazing CityCop EP 'Seasons'. This package will feature the following; 3 Envelopes featuring various things, handwritten lyrics booklet with cover made from pressed leaves, comes packaged in a small painted cardboard box, filled with straw and grass. Once again, super limited, to 5 of each colour. 

PINK CASSETTE WITH PINK CASE /5
BLUE CASSETTE WITH BLUE CASE /5

THIS IS THE FINAL PRESSING, ONLY ONE PRESS WAS ORIGINALLY PLANNED, SO BE QUICK.


***PLEASE NOTE*** THIS IS A PRE-ORDER, PLEASE ALLOW UPTO 4 WEEKS FOR THIS TO SHIP ***

Thank you.

Please note; FOR MAINLAND EUROPE ORDERS PLEASE CHOOSE 'GERMANY'. FOR USA AND CANADA PLEASE CHOOSE 'UNITED STATES'. FOR AUSTRALIA CHOOSE AUSTRALIA. ANYWHERE ELSE PLEASE EMAIL loverecords@live.co.uk




Listen to it in full here; http://citycop.bandcamp.com/

name: THE LOVE COLLECTION **SOLD OUT**
description:
The Love Collection is a charity compilation CD featuring some of the best up and coming musicians from an array of genres including Hardcore, Screamo, metal, acoustic, folk and emo.

All proceeds will go to Charity, and we mean everything,  the only thing we take from the final price is shipping, so we can post it to you. The charities are Oxfam and The M.S Society. Two highly worthy charities helping hundreds of thousands of people.

Included in the package is; Handpainted CD, in a handpainted and handwritten cardboard cover/ An 18 page zine, handwritten by each band with lyrics and others things/ various leaflets (they are limited so you may not get one, we will put something else in your package if you don't)/Handwritten tracklisting/thank you's.
IN ADDITION TO THAT;
The first 5 orders will get a free Nouvelle CD, free Alexander Korda US release tape and an Alexander Korda patch.
The next 5 orders will get a free Alexander Korda patch.

We'd like to thank anyone reading this for your support, we put a lot of work into this.

FOR EUROPEAN ORDERS PLEASE CHOOSE GERMANY/FOR EVERYWHERE ELSE PLEASE CHOOSE 'EVERYWHERE ELSE'. WE HOPE TO BE SHIPPING ORDERS ON WEDNESDAY THE 14TH OF DECEMBER.

name: Alexander Korda - 'Vous Avez Encore Des Secrets Á Dire' Cassette **SOLD OUT**
description:
Limited to 20.

UK release of the phenomenal 'Vous Avez Encore Des Secrets Á Dire' EP from Alexander Korda. Green tapes in black cases, with exclusive UK artwork, hand-written lyric sheets and a cardboard box.

Please note; This is a completely DIY release, because of this, not every tape will look perfect or the same, although we tried our hardest to make them identical and the best we could.

Please note; FOR MAINLAND EUROPE ORDERS PLEASE CHOOSE 'GERMANY'. FOR USA AND CANADA PLEASE CHOOSE 'UNITED STATES'. FOR AUSTRALIA CHOOSE AUSTRALIA. ANYWHERE ELSE PLEASE EMAIL loverecords@live.co.uk
